song.title: Vbladdiction2005
song.info:
Little blip blop tune originally done in 2002 for my first intro and entered the TRSAC 4channel compo. The swaptro using this tune got released later.
Got overhauled in 2005 - I guess on the Digibooster, not sure though - and uploaded here.
The download link at scene.org points to the 2002 original
